headline: Lockton Re Selects Verisk U.S. Agricultural Risk Models to Develop New (Re)Insurance Solutions
summary: BOSTON, Nov. 20, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Lockton Re, a leading global reinsurance broker, has announced a strategic collaboration with Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading global data analytics and technology provider, to bring new (re)insurance products to the market. Lockton Re will use Verisk’s agricultural risk modeling solutions – including Verisk's Multiple Peril Crop Insurance (MPCI) and Crop Hail Model for the U.S. – to understand how climate change and meteorological factors are impacting
